comments:
3.0 M8

I modified plugin dependencies in plugin.xml and clicked "Save" to save the 
file. At this time a workspace build was ongoing. A progress dialog opened and 
the UI blocked. There was no message indicating that an operation is ongoing 
which has to be finished first. As a result, the UI was locked and no feedback 
was given. Unpatient users might not wait if they have no feedback that the UI 
is waiting for something.

The following exception was logged:

java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
	at java.util.AbstractList$Itr.checkForComodification(Unknown Source)
	at java.util.AbstractList$Itr.next(Unknown Source)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.WorkspaceModelManager.fireModelProviderEvent
(WorkspaceModelManager.java:730)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.WorkspaceModelManager.fireModelsChanged
(WorkspaceModelManager.java:250)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.WorkspaceModelManager.handleFileChanged
(WorkspaceModelManager.java:238)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.WorkspaceModelManager.handleFileDelta
(WorkspaceModelManager.java:172)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.WorkspaceModelManager.visit
(WorkspaceModelManager.java:409)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.ResourceDelta.accept
(ResourceDelta.java:67)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.ResourceDelta.accept
(ResourceDelta.java:76)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.ResourceDelta.accept
(ResourceDelta.java:76)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.ResourceDelta.accept
(ResourceDelta.java:49)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.WorkspaceModelManager.handleResourceDelta
(WorkspaceModelManager.java:390)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.WorkspaceModelManager.resourceChanged
(WorkspaceModelManager.java:348)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager$2.run
(NotificationManager.java:255)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.run
(InternalPlatform.java:610)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Platform.run(Platform.java:521)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager.notify
(NotificationManager.java:248)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager.broadcastChanges
(NotificationManager.java:142)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.AutoBuildJob.broadcastChanges
(AutoBuildJob.java:71)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.AutoBuildJob.doBuild
(AutoBuildJob.java:135)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.AutoBuildJob.run
(AutoBuildJob.java:168)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:62)
Concurrency problems are fixed in M9.
